FairShake

Super PAC (Independent Expenditure-Only) - Unauthorized | ID: C00835959 | Registration date: March 23, 2023

The FairShake super PAC is a single-issue committee focused on cryptocurrency and blockchain policy. Although the committees do not acknowledge it, Fairshake is closely tied to both the conservative- and progressive-focused cryptocurrency PACs, Defend American Jobs and Protect Progress.

FairShake has raised
$162,465,845
They have spent
$40,665,513
of it so far. They have also transferred $64,250,000 to other crypto-focused committees.
